document_data.mainbody:
ook Isle was a hook-shaped island that was part of the Nelanther Isles, located south of the Dragons Head Peninsula. The island was southeast of Nemessor and just to the north of Thordentor.
The Bay of Skulls was the bay near the center of the island that gave the island its noticeable crescent or hook shape.
In 1360 DR, the Wyrmskull Throne was discovered here briefly by pirates taking shelter in the Bay of Skulls. It was lost again shortly after.
